title: Escrow for security
text: The seller provided multiple high quality pictures of the watch, was fast and thorough in their replies to my questions.  The Chrono24 escrow and 14 day return window provided peace of mind while awaiting the watch and inspecting it post-delivery.In the past, however, Chrono24 has failed to hold sellers accountable for stated return policies.

title: The transaction was seamless
text: The transaction was seamless.  Ordered it, paid for it in a manner that I felt most secure with, got updates on the parcel, and got the watch.  Loved how I benefited from their experience with different dealers.  I wouldn't have bought the item from where I did (Germany) without having that confidence.

title: Ahead od delivery date, good price
text: The seller offered a more competitive price after rejecting their first offer. The watch came ahead of the initially promised delivery date. I suspect the box was not the same as provided by the manufacturer - instead of a rugged plastic box for promasters, I gor a Citizen carton box. This wasn't a deal breaker for me.

title: High recommend Chrono24
text: I have purchased two watches from Chrono24 and also sold one on the platform. Huge choice of watches to buy at competitive prices. The buyer protection program is reassuring. Great experience.

title: Second transaction with Chrono
text: Second transaction with Chrono. Both items were exactly as described and the purchase process was smooth and easy. Highly recommend.

title: Other than not getting through the…
text: Other than not getting through the first time I called, when I did I got all questions answered immediately by a real professional. The purchasing experience is superb.

title: They were very engaging throughout the…
text: They were very engaging throughout the process and making sure to keep updating me the shipping status and following up with me when delivered and after delivery. I'm really pleased with their way of communication.

title: Another happy customer of Chrono24
text: Despite the Australian Border Force holding up the watch because of a CITES issue, I am delighted and satisfied with my purchase. Chrono24 and the dealer were making every effort to rectify the situation and find a solution. This dealer is highly recommended.

title: This was my first time using Chrono24
text: This was my first time using Chrono24, and my second time buying a watch on-line. The dealer reviews were a big part of my decision to try them out. Updates from Chrono24 came in right away, and up to and after delivery of the watch. I would have no hesitation to buy through a trusted dealer on this site again.

title: Great platform
text: Great platform. Seamless transaction. Having a middle man gave me the confidence to make a transaction this big over the internet. Would definitely use again.

title: C24 is an easy platform to negotiate
text: C24 is an easy platform to negotiate. Additionally, it has an extremely large selection of watches that you are almost guaranteed to find what you are looking for.

title: Shop With Confidence at Chrono24
text: Chrono24 made my search experience and transaction easy and pleasant.  Each listing is logically laid out and navigation is a breeze.  Shop with confidence here.

title: The best place for used watches
text: Good variety of choices from around the world, a generally top notch dealer population and clear listings. Definitely place to go for wristwatches.

title: Great system for buying authentic watches.
text: I purchased a Seiko SBPY165N 'Panda Style' Solar Chronograph and a Citizen Attesa Super Titanium GPS Solar Radio CC4058-67X from different dealers. Both arrived promptly, well-packaged, and with all necessary paperwork. When one watch was flagged by US Customs, the dealer responded quickly, ensuring smooth delivery. Chrono24’s platform made the purchase easy and secure, with excellent communication tools between buyer, seller, and Chrono24. I’ll definitely use this platform again and highly recommend it to others.

title: Awesome seller!
text: Seller was awesome throughout the whole process. They sent numerous photos of different watches without question. After purchase they held the postage upon request as I was over seas at the time. Once shipped it reached Australia within 24 hours and at my address within a couple of days after customs stung me with GST. Product ended up being better condition than advertised. Would certainly use again! Cheers!

title: Ordered a Watch from Japan and perfect
text: Ordered a Watch from Japan and based in Australia.Watch is 60 years old and in excellent condition as described.

title: Chrono24 representation of the watch…
text: Chrono24 representation of the watch and the dealer were very accurate. DHL, the shipper was horrible.  I would never use them again if I had a choice.  I have posted comments about DHL on a different web site, DHL action was not related to Chrono24 or the selling dealer.

title: Excellent easy to use platform and…
text: Excellent easy to use platform and access to great watchdeals and variety from around the world.

title: Watch was in perfect condition
text: Watch was in perfect condition, transaction went very smoothly, very happy with everything.

title: Very smooth and trust worthy…
text: Very smooth and trust worthy experience. Only complaint is the custom paper work from the import process. Wish Chrono24 could have explained it beforehand.

title: Smooth Transaction
text: Smooth TransactionVery pleased with how easy the purchase was. The seller packaged my timepiece with great care and promptly shipped my item. I highly recommend both the Chrono24 platform and the seller for providing a wonderful purchasing experience.

title: Chrono has been a reliable source of…
text: Chrono has been a reliable source of watches for me. Large collection to compare prices. Very pleased.

title: I was having a little trouble…

title: The entire process was amazing
text: The entire process was amazing. I was, at first, skeptical about sending money online.  I spent a fair amount of time researching chrono 24 and spoke to several users that eased my anxiety. Great company to deal with.  My watch was as advertised probably better.  Couldn't be happier.

title: Really simple and smooth experience
text: Really simple and smooth experience. As a first time buyer there are always reservations and questions when you are about to spend thousands of dollars on a watch the other side of the world.Chrono24 have a really smart system in place and as long as you research the seller and read reviews you should be able to relax and enjoy the experience.Would definitely use Chrono24 again and have been really impressed with not only the services they offer but the security and checkpoints (like 14 days hold on money in escrow) that they have in place.Excellent experience all round for me.

title: I've made two watch purchases through…Great Experience
text: I've made two watch purchases through Chrono24, and both experiences have been absolutely top-tier. The platform is reliable, easy to navigate, and provides a great selection of high-quality timepieces. Each transaction was smooth, and I felt confident with every step, from communication with the sellers to the secure payment process.Both watches I purchased arrived in perfect condition and exactly as described, which speaks volumes about the trustworthiness of the platform and its vendors. I highly recommend Chrono24 for anyone looking for a seamless, professional, and enjoyable watch-buying experience. I'll definitely be making more purchases here in the future!

title: I’m fully satisfied with Chrono24
text: I’m fully satisfied with Chrono24’s working and usefulness as a selling point for expensive watches with its reasonable offer of prices, the ease of doing business and the facilitation to communicate with the buyer. My only concern is security that it would reach the buyer safely with no untoward incidents along the way. Thankfully all went well though the watch was held up at the US customs for some days. Notwithstanding, it was important to communicate closely with the buyer and keep each other well-informed on the goings on.

title: I would highly recommend Chrono 24 to…
text: I would highly recommend Chrono 24 to anyone who is looking for a watch, whether it be used or new. In my case, I wanted to purchase an Omega Seamaster. After setting up my Search, and the particular filters that I desired in my watch purchase; Chrono 24 did the rest. I received frequent updates on Omega Seamaster watches that became available for sale. This really made it easy comparing watches, prices and even dealers. I ultimately purchased an Omega Seamaster 75th Anniversary in Summer Blue (38mm), for an incredible price. Thank you Chrono 24. Jim Geary

The prices are better than eBay and there is no “international shipping hub” which has “lost” (read: stolen) both a high end camera and a rare watch that was difficult to replace. In short, chrono24 is a refreshing marketplace. I hope they venture into other areas like high end vintage lenses and cameras.

title: Title: Excellent Platform for Buying and Negotiating Prices
text: I've had a fantastic experience selling my watch on Chrono24. The platform is not only user-friendly, but the best part is the ability to negotiate both the price and the shipping costs with potential buyers. This flexibility really sets Chrono24 apart, allowing for smoother transactions and satisfied customers on both sides. I highly recommend using Chrono24 for anyone looking to buy or sell luxury watches.Hamza Nisar

title: Outstanding service and communication
